description: colored image of a peeled banana lying on a wooden sofa, propped up with a green bolster pillow; yellow and white dots surround sofa
inscription: LRQ on back, in pencil: Nude Banana on a Sheraton-Style Sofa | DH | Dec. 31, \'81
medium: Graphite and colored pencil on paper
provenance: The artist; by descent to Thea Tenenbaum-Malferrari, Longmont, Colo.; given to MIA, 2017
title: Nude Banana on Sheraton-Style Sofa
